data.message: This is the only artist I'd pay to see right now, its crazy to think we are alive during his time and got to experience his music as it happened, seeing Eminem in concert would be like getting to go to one of Mozarts concerts, not to mention even spell check capitalizes his name

replies.message: He is amazing to see live a experience I will never forget
I've seen him live 3 times, 2 times when was usually spun out on drugs, both were awesome but the 3rd time was better he was so much into it..
I saw Eminem perform live at his concert in Melbourne Australia 2 years ago it was the best experience ever
I've never been to a concert of his and he's been the most inspirational musician in my life since 1997. I guess I'll have to make that a priority .. I'm slacking ! :P
plz view and support SLANG FOREVER lil nigga ft MQ (official video) youtube.com https://youtu.be/ ipmgW2_EtMM so they can ft shady one day
